articles.title: Solar Orbiter Closes in on Sun's Biggest Secret: Solving a 65-Year-Old Cosmic Mystery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A cosmic alignment and a little bit of spacecraft gymnastics have provided a ground-breaking measurement that is helping solve the 65-year-old cosmic mystery of why the Sun’s atmosphere is so hot. The Sun’s atmosphere is called the corona. It consists of an e…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Space Agency (ESA)September 21, 2023
The outer atmosphere of the Sun, known as the corona, can be seen stretching off into space in this image from Solar Orbiters Metis instrument. Metis … [+7830 chars]

articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Microsoft refreshes Surface Laptop Go and Laptop Studio - TechCrunch
articles.description: CEO Satya Nadella took the stage. But hardware was the real star today – specifically the Surface Laptop Go 3 and Surface Laptop Studio 2.
